notEnoughChars: You must enter at least @chars characters!
ariaNavigatedToSolution: Navigated to newly included sample solution after textarea.

taskDescription: A window is 150 centimeters wide and 90 centimeters high. If three times the area of the window is needed for curtain material, how much curtain material is needed in square meters?
